Name: Fairytale Figurine: Birdy the Friendly
Desc: A model of a friendly-looking Finchball that can be placed on a "Good Shelf" for display.\nIn some famous fairytales, cute Finches often surround people as they sing. In truth, however, such a sight is rare to see.\n"Allow me, then, to construct this cute model, that the regretful failings of reality might be mended!"
